data.message:
I wrote this a few years ago when this page wasn't very active.  Id like to see a difference between then and now.  What a better place to post it that annotation about Stan.   What does everyone think?   Dear Slim,

I messaged you but you still ain't got it
There probably was a problem with the post button or somthin'
I think about you everyday when I hit the bottle
I left my favourite song, album and my picture at the bottom
I sent two pieces of my collection but you still ain't got em'
loved your last album, that shit was awesome
Sometimes it gets me through the rough times
When I'm alone I wanna die, sometimes I think about gettin' high
But then I remember what you went through
How you were hiding from the public pryin'
I like to think I'm your biggest fan
Even though I've never seen you live
It's like a feelin in me that I try to deprive
People think it's an obsession but I don't agree
It's just your music is all that speaks to me
I try to write like you
But I haven't had to fight like you
No anger or sadness, just aspire to be the baddest
People think you fell off and it pisses me off
To see how hard you try knowing noone else can rhyme
Your Calm Down verse was straight Shady, took us back into times
Some say you're still a Bad Infulence
That your lyrics are like drinking brake fluids
I used the last line cause I couldn't think of anything else to rhyme
But I just don't think they understand the lines
You have been proclaimed Rap God and the greatest of all times
What else is left for the Brainless, aimless Bad Guy?
Oscar, Global Icon and Artist of the Decade to name a few
How many more awards can The Real Slim Shady do?
Maybe a Devil's Night 2?
I think I'm just rambling, I don't know how you can rhyme like you do
You say you bend words but my mind is bent in half
Just trying to get this to make half sense
I'm gonna post this on your Facebook wall
Just to see if I can get any likes at all
People post dumber shit than this
Like the same picture over and over about how you're the best
I'm bored so this is just a test.
I've been listening to you for over 10 years
Can't wait till ShadyXV with all your peers 
Right now I'm listening to Criminal, you clearly Just Don't Give a Fuck
Usually I like to Sing For the Moment
But Lose Yourself will always be my favourite
I could listen to that Till' I Collapse.
Anyways, I hope you get this man
Hit me back, just to chat...  Your biggest fan, this is Dan.
